column5: I would love to start my own fishing show on local networks.It doesnt have to be live,but it does have to be recent in the golden horseshoe and erie areas.mainly the creeks.And cleaning up is a must,bring your kids.Ive tried cleaning up bronte a few years back on my own time and money,no help from the town,they wouldnt pick up the bags despite it was beside the garbage cans.cleaned up the fishing lines on shore etc.I know for a fact what measures halton is doing to protect bronte from the on going construction.can we do the same in our favorite fishing holes?Next time im out Ill bring my camcorder to see if anything has changed in 5 yrs.who knows.
